  • JunkYard Simulator

    We’re announcing a date for DLC of JunkYard Simulator.

    We finished work on the voice acting and we successfully implemented it to the game. We have been working on translations, so far we added to the game 5 of 11 languages. We also fixed a few bugs and we improved the game according to the PlayWay QA suggestions.

     

    We are going to send updated and improved game to the PlayWay Tester Center before September 25.

    Adrian Kubasiak on September 11, 2019

  • JunkYard Simulator

    Two more languages for the JunkYard Simulator. 日本の and Svenska!

    We finished work on the voice acting and we successfully implemented it to the game. We have been working on translations, so far we added to the game 5 of 11 languages. We also fixed a few bugs and we improved the game according to the PlayWay QA suggestions.

     

    We are going to send updated and improved game to the PlayWay Tester Center before September 25.
